shot.composition: POV navigating through a coronary artery severely narrowed by jagged cholesterol deposits and plaque buildup (Atherosclerosis). 16:9.
shot.lens: Macro probe lens, emphasizing the tight space and rough, gritty textures.
shot.camera_movement: Tight, evasive maneuvering through the restricted maze of plaque. High-velocity movement through the bottleneck.

subject.description: Jagged, yellowish, unhealthy-looking cholesterol deposits and plaque protruding dangerously into the vessel. Red blood cells squeezing through the narrow path in a turbulent stream.
subject.props: Inflammatory cells (foam cells) embedded in the plaque. Eddy currents around the blockage.

scene.environment: A once smooth tunnel now constricted and hazardous. The walls appear inflamed, damaged, and rigid.

visual_details.action: Squeezing through the tight restrictions, avoiding collisions with the jagged plaque, navigating the intense turbulent flow. A dangerous obstacle course.
visual_details.special_effects: Realistic, detailed rendering of plaque texture (gritty, fatty deposits). Turbulent fluid dynamics in restricted space. Debris breaking off the plaque.
visual_details.negative_prompt_video: Smooth walls, wide open path, healthy appearance, blurry details, low resolution, black and white, grey tones, simple shapes, minimalism, calm flow.

cinematography.lighting: Harsh, high-contrast lighting emphasizing the jagged textures and the narrowed passage. A sickly, yellowish glow on the plaque.
cinematography.color_palette: Deep red (blood), sickly yellows, off-whites, and browns (plaque). Angry reds (inflammation).

audio.music: Tense, discordant electronic score with a driving, anxious rhythm (e.g., aggressive techno or drum and bass). Distorted synths.
audio.ambient: Turbulent, restricted fluid sound (high-pitched whistling sound due to constriction). Loud, strained heartbeat.
audio.sound_effects: Scraping, grinding sounds as the camera passes close to the plaque. Intense, pressurized whooshing.
